description: The initiative revolves around a family-owned winery, Bodega de la Torre, located in Chosmalal, Neuqu√©n. Established in 2008, it represents the fourth generation of winemaking in the region, focusing on both traditional and unique local grape varieties. The winery emphasizes organic and biodynamic practices, aiming to revive historical viticulture while fostering economic sustainability. Future plans include expanding production, enhancing tourism, and promoting Chosmalal as a recognized wine-producing area.
name: Bodega de la Torre
